com.pos.device.beeper

Class Beeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.beeper.Beeper

  • public final class Beeper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to control the Beeper of terminal.

    Created by NP-JAY on 2016/9/23.
